radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Gallbladder wall thickening and trace perihepatic fluid, no evidence of pneumo-peritoneum or of a radiopaque foreign body.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Lateral image of the right elbow
radiographic_examinations.findings: Posterior dislocation of the elbow with impaction of the olecranon process of the ulna into the distal humerus outside the olecranon fossa.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent images confirmed normal alignment after closed reduction and splinting.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Anteroposterior image of the right elbow
radiographic_examinations.findings: Dislocation of the elbow with malalignment of the ulnotrochlear and radiocapitellar joints.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent images confirmed normal alignment after closed reduction and splinting.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Lateral image of the left elbow
radiographic_examinations.findings: Posterior dislocation of the left elbow with a fragment from a displaced fracture of the trochlea.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial findings showed dislocation, later reduced and casted.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Lateral image of the left elbow after closed reduction
radiographic_examinations.findings: Normal alignment with the presence of a cast.
